name: bottlecap
description: A 2D GAME FRAMEWORK FOR HYPERCASUAL GAMES

scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run bundle:esm && npm run bundle:esm:min && tsc --allowJs --declaration --emitDeclarationOnly ./dist/index.js ./dist/index.min.js
scripts.bundle:esm:min: terser --ecma 6 --compress --mangle --module -o dist/index.min.js -- dist/index.js && gzip -9 -c dist/index.min.js > dist/index.min.js.gz

author: Harsh Singh
